title: Joe Biden 'Asleep' at Climate Summit Sparks Wave of Criticism and Sympathy
content:
1. Joe Biden 'Asleep' at Climate Summit Sparks Wave of Criticism and Sympathy  Newsweek
  2. Joe Biden accused of falling asleep during Cop26 climate summit speeches  The Independent
  3. VIPs including Jeff Bezos flew to a climate conference on 400 private jets, sparking fury over the carbon emissions caused  Yahoo News
  4. Pacific islanders aren’t just victims – we know how to fight the climate crisis  The Guardian
  5. Cop26: welcome to Glasgow – the world is watching  The Guardian
contentSnippet:
Joe Biden 'Asleep' at Climate Summit Sparks Wave of Criticism and Sympathy  Newsweek
Joe Biden accused of falling asleep during Cop26 climate summit speeches  The Independent
VIPs including Jeff Bezos flew to a climate conference on 400 private jets, sparking fury over the carbon emissions caused  Yahoo News
Pacific islanders aren’t just victims – we know how to fight the climate crisis  The Guardian
Cop26: welcome to Glasgow – the world is watching  The Guardian

localize.title: ジョー・バイデン、気候変動サミットでの "居眠り "に批判と同情の声が殺到
